page.title: 06HOLT CRAFT CENTRE
page.content: {The Holt Craft Centre}is a large building where crafts of all kinds are made and sold by people of all ages. There is a wide range of crafts from toy making to knitting jumpers. At the centre you can look around and buy almost anything. There are interesting things to look at, such as hand-made dolls, fishing flies, cuddly toys, taxidermy, pottery and jigsaws, clock-making and woodturners, wedding dress making,stained glass and glass engraving, three types of artists, flower pressing and painting eggs. At the back of the centre is a tea room where you can have a soothing cup of tea. If you enter the courtyard you will find a childrens corner with farm animals, like hens, chickens and also geese.
